```{r echo=FALSE}
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4090169/elegant-way-to-check-for-missing-packages-and-install-them
list.of.packages <- c("bookdown", "knitr", "pheatmap", "data.table", "UpSetR", "dplyr", "kableExtra", "BiocManager")
new.packages <- list.of.packages[!(list.of.packages %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]
if(length(new.packages)) install.packages(new.packages, dependencies = T)

list.of.bioconductorpakg <- c("ropls")
new.packages <- list.of.bioconductorpakg[!(list.of.bioconductorpakg %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]

BiocManager::install(new.packages, suppressUpdates=TRUE)
```
